alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 22 at 4:05PM PST until December 25 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT PST SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations between 7 and 15 inches, locally to 20 inches near the Cascade crest. Ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Stevens Pass, Leavenworth, Stehekin, Holden Village, and Plain. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to Midnight PST Saturday Night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday through Saturday commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County
